turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help with an order. My order number is 78901. What is the status?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I can check that for you. Please give me a moment while I look up order number 78901.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I'm just wondering because it's been a few days since I placed it, and the status online still says 'Confirmed'.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I see the status for order 78901 is 'Processing'. This means your order has been received and is being prepared for shipment. You will receive a tracking number via email once it ships.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Processing? But it's been 'Processing' since yesterday! The website said orders ship within 1-2 business days. It's frustrating that it hasn't moved. Is there a delay or something wrong with my order specifically?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. While we strive to meet the 1-2 business day timeframe, during periods of high volume, processing can sometimes take a little longer. There is no issue with your specific order. It is in the queue to be picked and packed.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: So it's just a general delay? That makes sense, I guess, but it would be good if the status was clearer or there was a note about delays. Thanks for checking, though. At least I know it's not lost.
